definitions.meaning: part (esp. of the body, but also of a vegetable (e.g. the root), or a garment (e.g. the sleeve) etc)

sentences.translation: Which part of the chicken is this?

sentences.simplifiedText: 请仔细检查机器的各个部位以确保安全。
sentences.traditionalText: 請仔細檢查機器的各個部位以確保安全。
sentences.pinyin: qǐng zǐxì jǐanchá jīqì de gègè bùwèi yǐ qùebǎo ānquán.
sentences.translation: Please carefully check all parts of the machine to ensure safety.
